original_title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Relaxation
overview: Transition from your busy day to a series of slow, mindful movements allowing you to calm the mind and release stress. Take it down, one pose at a time.
tagline: Easy-to-follow series that builds strength & improves flexibility.
title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Relaxation
